explains: adj. （房间或空间）大而空的，像洞穴的；大而深陷的
wordGroup: cavernous sinus 海绵窦；海绵窦综合征

sentences.en: His spectacles flashed a last gleam before he disappeared into the cavernous hallway.
sentences.cn: 在他消失在洞穴似的走廊前，那副眼镜闪过最后一丝微光。

sentences.en: Climbing steep stairs to the choir gallery you peer into a cavernous interior.
sentences.cn: 登上陡峭的楼梯来到唱诗班楼座，你便可窥见如洞穴般空旷的内部。

sentences.en: In South Asia, this makes the car downright cavernous.
sentences.cn: 而在南亚，这使它看起来像一团发泡海绵。
